item.title: 2017 Nth Degree Merlot
item.summary: Our 2017 nth DEGREE Merlot is complex with aromatics of clove and cocoa powder followed by ripe red fruit and blueberry compote. This wine is medium in body with soft, smooth tannins and will continue to evolve beautifully with age. Our winemaking team suggests decanting this wine upon drinking.

item.title: 2018 Nth Degree Cabernet Sauvignon
item.summary: This wine is polished and supple with varietal layerings of black cherry, fresh tobacco, and black olive interlaced with dark chocolate and black tea. Compelling ripeness and fine grain tannins will tempt for early drinking, but the depth, balance, and sheer fruity richness of this wine promises good things to come for many years into the future.

item.title: 2018 Nth Degree Cabernet Sauvignon - 6 Pack
item.summary: This wine is polished and supple with varietal layerings of black cherry, fresh tobacco, and black olive interlaced with dark chocolate and black tea. Compelling ripeness and fine grain tannins will tempt for early drinking, but the depth, balance, and sheer fruity richness of this wine promises good things to come for many years into the future.

item.title: 2019 Petite Sirah
item.summary: Our 2019 Limited Release Petite Sirah is a wine where exuberant richness is honed by a judicious degree of crafting and tailoring. While predictably big and burly on the palate, this wine remains focused on its core aromas and flavors of black soils, violet florals, and rich blackberry compote.

item.title: 2019 Petite Sirah Port
item.summary: Beautiful dense color with aromas of mint, chocolate, and a hint of vanilla. Flavors of dark, ripe briar fruit on the palate, displaying baking spices and nuances of coffee beans that follow through the finish.

item.title: 2020 Cabernet Franc
item.summary: Our 2020 Small Lot Cabernet Franc is wonderfully layered with toasty oak richness, lovely aromas of lavender, and concentrated flavors of black cherry, herbs de Provence, and olive. The tannins provide enough structure to make this wine cellar worthy over the next five to eight years while also polished enough to enjoy today

item.title: 2020 Duetto Cabernet Sauvignon
item.summary: A tale of two vineyards, the 2020 Artist Series Duetto represents the thoughtful merger of two of Wente's best growing sites for Cabernet Sauvignon, the Karl and the Mel vineyards. The resulting blend exhibits a level of immense richness that is carefully honored by a sense of refinement and elegance.

item.title: 2020 Gsm
item.summary: Our 2020 GSM is a beautifully balanced blend opening with melted caramel and allspice aromas. This wine offers continuous fruit flavors with a subtle bit of savory Syrah layered in for good measure. The mouthfeel is gently firmed by fine-grain tannins that promise to hold this rich and full-bodied wine up for years to come.

item.title: 2020 Harmony
item.summary: Our 2020 Artist Series Harmony is a blend that is very unique to Wente Vineyards. Notes of blueberry, violet, and rosemary merge with black cherry and tannic depth provided by the Cabernet Sauvignon.

item.title: 2020 Meritage
item.summary: Our 2020 Meritage shows the balanced depth and richness that Bordeaux style blends bring to the table. Rich, creamy French Oak blends with the layers of cinnamon, cardamom, and raw vanilla bean. These notes are matched equally by a generous concentration of fully ripened black currants, juicy black cherries, and rich plum jam.

item.title: 2020 Nth Degree Merlot
item.summary: Generous flavors and aromas of candied cherries and red currants form the foundation of our 2020 nth DEGREE Merlot. Delightfully deep and focused, the juicy and satisfying fruit unfolds with layers of rich creamy oak that profiles chocolate, toasted marshmallow, and fresh cinnamon sticks. While open and accessible now, those with patience will find this wine evolves beautifully over the next 10 years.

item.title: 2020 Nth Degree Pinot Noir
item.summary: Our 2020 nth DEGREE Pinot Noir leads with a mix of black cherry and ripe cranberry aromas that are framed by an abundance of sweet oaky overlays. Finely focused flavors of bright fruit and wildflowers are supported by a generous dollop of deep and inviting toasty oak spice. Accents of hazelnut and vanilla flirt with a faint wisp of black pepper and fresh tobacco, leaving a slightly velvety finish.

item.title: 2020 Nth Degree Pinot Noir 6 Pack
item.summary: Our 2020 nth DEGREE Pinot Noir leads with a mix of black cherry and ripe cranberry aromas that are framed by an abundance of sweet oaky overlays. Finely focused flavors of bright fruit and wildflowers are supported by a generous dollop of deep and inviting toasty oak spice. Accents of hazelnut and vanilla flirt with a faint wisp of black pepper and fresh tobacco, leaving a slightly velvety finish.

item.title: 2020 Nth Degree Syrah
item.summary: Our 2020 nth DEGREE Syrah has a big character and layered aromatics from smoked meat, graham cracker, boysenberry, and fresh red cherries. On the palate, this wine shows notes of dried cranberries, black pepper, red plum, and fig.

item.title: 2020 Nth Degree Syrah - 6 Pack
item.summary: Our 2020 nth DEGREE Syrah has a big character and layered aromatics from smoked meat, graham cracker, boysenberry, and fresh red cherries. On the palate, this wine shows notes of dried cranberries, black pepper, red plum, and fig.

item.title: 2020 Serenity
item.summary: Our 2020 Artist Series Serenity showcases plenty presence of rich, sweet oak including baked cinnamon and vanilla bean. These notes perfectly compliment the abundant blackberry and plum fruit flavors that form the body of this wine. There is a hint of black tea and white pepper that never lets you forget that Syrah is the core of this beautiful blend.

item.title: 2020 Zinfandel
item.summary: Our 2020 Limited Release Zinfandel is a beautiful representation of the classic, California varietal. On the palate you’ll find notes of jammy black currant and plum with supporting notes of chocolate cream and graham cracker crust.

item.title: 2021 Aly's Pinot Noir
item.summary: Our 2021 Aly's Pinot Noir is fruit driven with a touch of oak to frame it. Layered aromas evolve from ripe cherry and rose petal to pie crust and forest floor. This wine presents flavors of red cherry and vanilla that is followed by a vibrant acidity.

item.title: 2021 Baily Hill Pinot Noir
item.summary: The 2021 Baily Hill Pinot Noir epitomizes the essence of a cool coastal climate, showcasing the vibrancy and fruit-forward nature characteristic of the region. It’s a captivating bouquet with youthful aromas that immediately entice the senses. Ripe Bing cherries and succulent strawberries dominate the forefront, intertwining seamlessly with subtle nuances of dark soils, fragrant sage, and hints of smoked nuts, adding complexity to the palate.

item.title: 2021 Beyer Ranch Zinfandel
item.summary: Since 1883, five generations of our family have handcrafted fine wines that express the very best of our vineyards and winemaking expertise. Our Beyer Ranch has historically been a premier location for Zinfandel. The vineyards are planted on carefully selected sites of sloping benches that lead to the banks of the Arroyo del Valle and Arroyo Mocho streams. Grapes from these Zinfandel vineyards produce luscious wines with deep richness.

item.title: 2021 Cabernet Franc
item.summary: The 2021 Small Lot Cabernet Franc from Wente Vineyards is wonderfully layered with aromas of red cherry, baked cinnamon and molasses. Ripe red cherry continues to form the core of this wines flavor profile along with a touch of olive and warm vanilla oak into the finish. This medium bodied wine is polished and refined to such a degree that it is eminently attractive right now but should age and evolve beautifully for the next seven years.

item.title: 2021 Gsm
item.summary: Our 2021 Artist Series GSM rides the line between bright Grenache and savory Syrah with a hint of Mourvedre. Label created by Artist Jun Yang.

item.title: 2021 Meritage
item.summary: Our 2021 Meritage shows the balanced depth and richness that Bordeaux style blends bring to the table. The nose opens with red and black cherries, anise and currants framed by warm baking spice and vanilla bean French oak notes. The rich and full entry on the palate gives way to supple lingering tannins.

item.title: 2021 Mount Diablo Highlands Red Blend
item.summary: Since 1883, the Wente family has devoted itself to crafting exceptional wines that embody the essence of our vineyards and the depth of our winemaking heritage. Our Mount Diablo Red Blend is a testament to the winemaking expertise that defines our legacy. It is a harmonious blend of varieties that the family has cultivated over five generations on the Central Coast of California.

item.title: 2021 Nth Degree Chardonnay
item.summary: Our 2021 nth DEGREE Chardonnay shows why Wente has been championing this varietal here in the Livermore Valley for over 100 years. This Chardonnay from one of our Heritage blocks boasts aromas of candied apple, ripe pear, pineapple, clove, and toasted brioche. This full-bodied wine has flavors of ripe red apple, vanilla, and nutmeg. The balance of ripe fruit and toasted oak lead to a rich finish that keeps you coming back for more.

item.title: 2021 Nth Degree Merlot
item.summary: Our 2021 Merlot has aromatics of candied red cherry and a touch of blueberry jam, a sweet and fruity profile, while the notes of cocoa and baked cinnamon add layers of complexity and warmth. A full body wine with s substantial mouth feel that finishes with big silky tannins. A well-structured wine that provides a balanced and smooth conclusion to each sip.

item.title: 2021 Nth Degree Pinot Noir
item.summary: Our 2021 nth DEGREE Pinot Noir is dark ruby in color and shows aromas of black cherry and ripe cranberry that are framed by vanilla and toasted oak. The nth DEGREE is a selection of handcrafted, limited production wines created by Fifth Generation Winemaker, Karl D. Wente. The focus of this small lot program is to create wines that reflect the distinctive terroir of the Wente family’s estate vineyards in Livermore Valley and Arroyo Seco, Monterey.

item.title: 2021 Nth Degree Syrah
item.summary: Our 2021 nth DEGREE Syrah leads with a mix of ripe plum and black olive aromas that are framed by an abundance of sweet oak overlays suggestive of baked cinnamon. The flavors juxtapose fruity notes of blackberry and pluot with savory smoked meat and spicy black pepper to form a deep and classically Rhone styled Syrah. While rich and full bodied, this wine also showcases a velvety roundness that lingers well into the finish.

item.title: 2021 Sandstone Merlot
item.summary: Our 2021 Sandstone Merlot is supple and beautifully balanced, showcasing aromas of ripe red cherry and plum that are complimented by creamy oak notes of sweet caramel and vanilla bean. Additional notes of white pepper, cardamom, and graphite provide more complexity and continue to develop as the wine breathes in the glass.

item.title: 2021 Serenity
item.summary: Our 2021 Serenity Red Wine is a proprietary blend of Syrah, Petite Sirah, Grenache, and Mourvedre that impresses with its exotic substance, riveting depth, and engaging complexity. There is plenty of sweet oak that showcases baked cinnamon and vanilla bean which perfectly compliments the abundant candied red cherry and dried fruit flavors.

item.title: 2021 Sonata
item.summary: The 2021 Sonata Red Wine is an Australian inspired blend of Cabernet and Syrah that impresses with its exotic substance and engaging complexity. Abundant aromas of blackberry and plum fruit form the essence of this elegantly styled wine. Complimentary oak spices of fresh vanilla bean with a hint of glazed caramel do an excellent job of framing the core of dark fruit flavors in the mid-palate. Bright acidity and youthful tannins will help this wine to shine at your dinner table tonight but will also promise good things for those that can hold a bottle for five or six years.

item.title: 2021 Southern Hills Cabernet Sauvignon
item.summary: Our Southern Hills Cabernet Sauvignon is named for our vineyards located along the southern hills of the Central Coast. The Wente family farms approximately 400 acres of Cabernet Sauvignon vineyards using the two clones originating from California wine pioneer Charles Wetmore’s Bordeaux cuttings in the 19th century. With well-drained rocky soils and unique microclimates, the Southern Hills vineyards are in the most desirable settings, with exposures ideal for growing Cabernet Sauvignon of distinct character, depth, and intensity.

item.title: 2021 Wetmore Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon
item.summary: The 2021 vintage Wetmore Cabernet Sauvignon impresses with its unwavering commitment to the varietal's essence, displaying exemplary structure and a lavish richness.

item.title: 2021 Zinfandel
item.summary: Our 2021 Small Lot Zinfandel is full of sweet oak flavors that play a significant role in the wine's character but not one that overshadows its deep and generous fruit profile. Dark chocolate, nutmeg, and dried fig are prominent in the aroma profile alongside rich and expressive Zinfandel fruit. Jammy boysenberry and ripe plum form the core of the palate with supporting notes of black pepper and spice.

item.title: 2022 Aly's Pinot Noir
item.summary: Our 2022 Aly’s Pinot Noir was crafted to showcase the Arroyo Seco AVA terroir. The wine has expressive aromas of cherry, cranberry, rose petal, forest floor and cinnamon. Bright flavors of red cherry and vanilla are rounded out by focused acidity.

item.title: 2022 Gsm
item.summary: The 2022 Artist Series GSM opens with aromas of cherry sauce, plum, smoked meat and brown sugar. Flavors hit all of the markers for a Rhone style blend offering continuous fruit with a subtle bit of white pepper and earth on the finish. The palate is bright and finishes with fine grained tannins.

item.title: 2022 Nth Degree Chardonnay
item.summary: The 2022 nth DEGREE Chardonnay is a testament to Wente's long history of crafting world-class Chardonnay. This Chardonnay boasts complex aromas that include ripe apple, nectarine, clove, and brioche. This full-bodied wine has flavors of red apple, pear, and sweet baking spices. The balance of generous fruit and toasted oak leads to a rich finish that keeps you coming back for more.

item.title: 2022 Nth Degree Pinot Noir
item.summary: The 2022 nth DEGREE Pinot Noir from Wente Vineyards demonstrates the depth of the Dijon Clone. Dark ruby in the glass, the wine smells of black cherry and blackberries framed by vanilla and toasted oak. Flavors of ripe dark fruits and baking spices are followed by silky tannins.

item.title: 2022 Riva Ranch Chardonnay
item.summary: The 2022 Riva Ranch Vineyard Chardonnay has plenty of character. It is loaded with perfectly ripened apples, lemon curd, and toasted brioche, which team together to form the foundation of this deep and delightfully expressive vineyard selection. The optimally ripened fruit is complimented by a tasteful measure of slightly creamy oak that hints at notes of toasted marshmallow, along with a dollop of buttery richness that lasts well into the lengthy finish.

item.title: 2022 Riva Ranch Pinot Noir
item.summary: The 2022 Riva Ranch Vineyard Pinot Noir is a bright, buoyant, and altogether compelling example of the Arroyo Secco appellation. This year’s bottling offers up youthful aromas of ripe black cherries and briary currents that are seamlessly combined with an integrated layer of toasty oak spice, showing hints of baked cinnamon and chestnut. Supple and rounded tannins combined with juicy acidity keep the wine balanced from front to back.

item.title: 2022 Riverbank Riesling
item.summary: Our 2022 Riverbank Riesling is packed with a fruity vibrancy and complimentary aromatic floral notes. Honeysuckle and orange blossom dominate the nose of this wine, backed by notes of ripe peach, white apricot, and a hint of honeydew melon. This wine has a rich and rounded mouthfeel with a hint of mid-palate sweetness that is balanced with a welcoming acidity.

item.title: 2023 Eric's Chardonnay
item.summary: The 2023 Eric's Chardonnay is unoaked to exemplify the beautiful varietal character of Livermore Valley Chardonnay. This unoaked Chardonnay is bursting with aromas of citrus, melon, and white flowers. The wine has bright flavors of honeydew and meyer lemon with a touch of minerality.

item.title: 2023 Hayes Ranch Rosé
item.summary: Hayes Ranch 2023 Rosé offers an irresistible invitation to indulge in its delightful blend of fruity aromas and flavors. With its unctuous texture, juicy palate, and balanced acidity, this wine promises a thoroughly enjoyable drinking experience. Perfect for leisurely sipping on warm summer days or pairing with light, fresh dishes, our Rosé is sure to delight wine enthusiasts seeking a vibrant and refreshing Rosé.

item.title: 2023 Louis Mel Sauvignon Blanc
item.summary: Our 2023 Louis Mel Sauvignon Blanc displays classic fruit combined with juicy acidity which adds up to a wine bursting with youthful exuberance. This vintage showcases notes of classic grapefruit with additional notes of white apricot, guava, and key lime. These notes are complemented by fruit-driven flavors of sweet Meyer lemon and candied citrus. This wine is well rounded with a balanced acidity, complimented by a touch of minerality on the finish.

item.title: 2023 Morning Fog Chardonnay
item.summary: Our 2023 Morning Fog Chardonnay bursts with aromatics of citrus and green apple complemented by hints of toasty oak and vanilla from barrel-aging. This wine is balanced by a lingering minerality and natural acidity to create a beautiful wine.

item.title: 2023 Sauvignon Blanc
item.summary: The 2023 Wente Vineyards Limited Release Sauvignon Blanc has beautiful aromatics of green melon and passion fruit framed by subtle sweet oak. The wine has flavors of ripe grapefruit and honeydew backed by bright acidity.

item.title: Artist Series Duo
item.summary: A duo of our 2021 Artist Series Wines, Serenity & GSM, adorned with original artwork created by local artist Jun Yang.

item.title: Artist Series Set
item.summary: A collection of our 2020 Artist Series wines, adorned with original artwork created by local artist Fiammy Dizon.

item.title: Billy Nation, July 19
item.summary: July 19, 2024. Bring your low-back chairs or blankets; it is first-come, first-served on the concert lawn. Each ticket price includes a glass of wine upon arrival*! All shows are 21 & Over. Doors open at 5:00 pm and the band starts at 8:00 pm.

item.title: Brut Duo
item.summary: This bundle includes two bottles of Brut Sparkling Wine. This is a classic Brut, with aromas and flavors of pear and dried apricot with hints of crème brulee and apple. It has nice complexity from the sur lies aging in the Methode Champenoise, and has a refreshing crispness and lingering vanilla cream aftertaste that pairs exceptionally well with food.

item.title: Brut Sparkling Wine
item.summary: This is a classic Brut, with aromas and flavors of pear and dried apricot with hints of crème brulee and apple. It has nice complexity from the sur lies aging in the Methode Champenoise, and has a refreshing crispness and lingering vanilla cream aftertaste that pairs exceptionally well with food.

item.title: Cabernet Duo
item.summary: A duo of the world's most celebrated red wine grape, Cabernet Sauvignon.

item.title: Cabernet Sauvignon Lovers
item.summary: This bold red is the world's most popular varietal for good reason, it's delicious and pairs excellently with a wide range of dishes.

item.title: Chardonnay Lovers
item.summary: The ideal gift for all the Chardonnay lovers out there. Including three bottles of the varietal, each showcasing their unique style.

item.title: Chardonnay Lovers 6 Pack
item.summary: The ideal gift for all the Chardonnay lovers out there. Including 6 bottles of the varietal, each showcasing their unique style.

item.title: Club Wente Golf Membership
item.description:
Benefits:
Reduced green fees for members and guests of members. Complimentary 45-day advance tee time reservations. Invitations to exclusive member-only events. 20% discount on all merchandise in the golf shop (excluding golf clubs and golf balls). 25% discount on golf lessons with our professional staff. Optional add on NCGA membership
*Please allow 24-48 hours for your membership to be activated.
item.summary:
Benefits:
•Reduced green fees for members and guests of members. •Complimentary 45-day advance tee time reservations. •Invitations to exclusive member-only events. •20% discount on all merchandise in the golf shop (excluding golf clubs and golf balls). •25% discount on golf lessons with our professional staff. •Optional add on NCGA membership *Please allow 24-48 hours for your membership to be activated.

item.title: Crawdad Republic Plus Wolf Hamlin And The Front Porch Drifters, June 14
item.summary: June 14, 2024. Bring your low-back chairs or blankets; it is first-come, first-served on the concert lawn. Each ticket price includes a glass of wine upon arrival*! All shows are 21 & Over. Doors open at 5:00 pm and the band starts at 8:00 pm.

item.title: Dinner Party Set
item.summary: Delight everyone at the table with this selection of Wente Vineyards favorites.

item.title: Dinner With Niki Wente - Club
item.summary: August 17, From 5:00pm - 8:00pm. Join Niki Wente for the much-anticipated return of Wente’s famous Pork Chop dinner. Enjoy passed appetizers, followed by a delicious 3-course dinner paired with exquisite wines. After dinner, unwind at our Member’s Night in the Tasting Lounge, where you can enjoy wine tasting, live music, and a relaxing atmosphere.

item.title: Dinner With Niki Wente - Guest
item.summary: August 17, From 5:00pm - 8:00pm. Join Niki Wente for the much-anticipated return of Wente’s famous Pork Chop dinner. Enjoy passed appetizers, followed by a delicious 3-course dinner paired with exquisite wines. After dinner, unwind at our Member’s Night in the Tasting Lounge, where you can enjoy wine tasting, live music, and a relaxing atmosphere.

item.title: Egift Card
item.description:
Digital Gift Cards make for the perfect gift, even last minute! We’ll send your digital Gift Card by email immediately – including your personal message, the dollar amount, and a unique redemption code to be entered at checkout.
Promotional offers and discounts may not be applied toward the purchase of gift cards. Gift cards are not redeemable for cash, except where required by law. Gift cards have no fees, are non-refundable, and do not expire.
item.summary:
Digital Gift Cards make for the perfect gift, even last minute! We’ll send your digital Gift Card by email immediately – including your personal message, the dollar amount, and a unique redemption code to be entered at checkout.
Promotional offers and discounts may not be applied toward the purchase of gift cards. Gift cards are not redeemable for cash. Gift cards have no fees, are non-refundable, and do not expire. Redeemable for online wine purchases only, excludes Wente Golf & The Grill.

item.title: Evolution (journey Tribute), August 24
item.summary: August 24, 2024. Bring your low-back chairs or blankets; it is first-come, first-served on the concert lawn. Each ticket price includes a glass of wine upon arrival*! All shows are 21 & Over. Doors open at 5:00 pm and the band starts at 8:00 pm.

item.title: From Our Vineyard
item.summary: An expression of our two vineyards from iconic growing regions. Chardonnay from our Riva Ranch Vineyard in Arroyo Seco, Monterey & Cabernet Sauvignon from our Wetmore Vineyard in Livermore Valley.

item.title: Hayes Ranch Rose - 6 Pack
item.summary: Stock up for the season with our exclusive six bottle offer of Hayes Ranch Rosé.

item.title: Holiday To The Nth Degree
item.summary: Elevate your holiday to the nth DEGREE with the ultimate gift bundle.

item.title: May 3rd Release Party
item.summary:
Friday, May 3 from 6:00pm – 8:00pm
Tickets to this release event are $25, members may purchase any quantity. Ticket required to enter.
Indulge in a Fiesta for the Senses: Join us for a Memorable Wine Club Event!
Join us for an enchanting evening, where mariachi melodies, mouth-watering tacos, and our latest wine releases converge in a beautiful setting on our outdoor patio and barrel room.

item.title: May 4th Release Party
item.summary:
Saturday, May 4 from 6:00pm – 9:00pm.
Tickets to this release event are $50, members may purchase any quantity. Ticket required to enter.
Immerse yourself in an exclusive club event celebrating the legendary sounds of Santana with a tribute band performance, while indulging in the culinary delights of our new menu from the Grill at Wente Vineyards. Whether you choose to bask in the outdoor ambiance or embrace the rustic charm of our barrel room, you’ll have the opportunity to taste our latest wine releases alongside offerings from our food stations.
An exciting Sensory Blind Tasting Contest will be held in the caves! Test your palate as you smell and taste mystery wines. Top Legacy/nth DEGREE winners will receive a special *nth DEGREE prize*, top Small Lot winners will receive a *Small Lot prize*.

item.title: Mustache Harbor - General Admission
item.summary: June 2, 2023, Bring your low-back chairs or blankets; it is first-come, first-served on the concert lawn. Limited tables and chairs will be at the back of the venue. Each ticket price includes a glass of wine upon arrival*! All shows are 21 & Over. Doors open at 6:00 pm and the band starts at 8:00 pm.

item.title: Mustache Harbor - Vip Table
item.summary: VIP Admission purchase includes a reserved table (seats up to 10), a gourmet cheese and charcuterie box for the table, and 2 bottles of wine from our menu.

item.title: Nth Degree Set
item.summary: A superb selection that brings gifting to the nth DEGREE.

item.title: Red Wine Lovers
item.summary: This is the perfect gift for the red wine lovers in your life, featuring two limited-release wines.

item.title: Riva Ranch Duo
item.summary: A match made in heaven from our iconic Riva Ranch Vineyard in Arroyo Seco, Monterey.

item.title: Sauvignon Blanc Case
item.summary: 12 Bottles of Louis Mel Sauvignon Blanc. Take a case home today!

item.title: Tasting With Karl Wente - Club
item.summary: Friday, August 16, from 6:00pm – 9:00pm. Join Karl Wente for an exclusive tasting of our newest wine releases and an insightful discussion about the 2024 Harvest season. This is your chance to ask Karl about our wines, vines, and sustainable farming and winemaking practices.

item.title: Tasting With Karl Wente - Guest
item.summary: From 6:00pm - 9:00pm. Join Karl Wente for an exclusive tasting of our newest wine releases and an insightful discussion about the 2024 Harvest season. This is your chance to ask Karl about our wines, vines, and sustainable farming and winemaking practices.

item.title: The Best Intentions, June 28
item.summary: June 28, 2024. Bring your low-back chairs or blankets; it is first-come, first-served on the concert lawn. Each ticket price includes a glass of wine upon arrival*! All shows are 21 & Over. Doors open at 5:00 pm and the band starts at 8:00 pm.

item.summary: July 6, 2024. Bring your low-back chairs or blankets; it is first-come, first-served on the concert lawn. Each ticket price includes a glass of wine upon arrival*! All shows are 21 & Over. Doors open at 5:00 pm and the band starts at 8:00 pm.

item.title: Ultimate Red Wines
item.summary: The perfect way to try a wide selection of Wente red varietals.
